resources.string: The blight is a curse of earth, and being of the earth also makes it a curse of the body as well. The fiends in Edengrove are infected by it, but the blight infects the human body as well. It weakens you, pulling you closer to death with every breath. Be careful, you must prepare a proper defense against it when in blighted areas of Edengrove.

Outpost Rush is a 20 vs 20 match that takes place on a large island with three Outposts.\nPlayers compete to capture and hold these Outposts for as long as possible, increasing their team's score in the process.
He might think so. My blooms do have this effect on humans, sometimes. I will collect him.\n\nThe cure is gruesome, but effective. Harvest some Blight and bring it to my grotto. I will mark your map.
